boardgame.description: Zombicide is a collaborative game in which players take the role of a survivor _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; each with unique abilities _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and harness both their skills and the power of teamwork against the hordes of unthinking undead! Zombies are predictable, stupid but deadly, controlled by simple rules and a deck of cards. Unfortunately for you, there are a LOT more zombies than you have bullets._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Find weapons, kill zombies. The more zombies you kill, the more skilled you get; the more skilled you get, the more zombies appear. The only way out is zombicide!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Play ten scenarios on different maps made from the included modular map tiles, download new scenarios from the designer's website, or create your own!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; This is just a great game for zombie lovers!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Zombicide Season 2: Prison Outbreak_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Zombicide Season 3: Rue Morgue_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: This is for the KICKSTARTER ABOMINATION LEVEL with extra survivors and zombie versions, dice, zombies, signed lithograph, etc. See Kickstarter page for details. Note that some items will ship later. Base game is here now, plus extra zombies, three additional survivors, special dice, and more. This deal also includes an XL T-shirt. Shipping is $30 for USA (that includes shipping now and later). I will consider shipping elsewhere, but it would be $115 for the UK, for example. I will ship what I already have right away, and will ship all other materials after they have all been received by me. Add 4% for PayPal payment. Think $160 plus $30 shipping is too much? MAKE ME AN OFFER!

Brand new in shrink. Kickstarted at abomination level. Update: This is what you get at an Abomination ($100) level pledge! Manufacturer estimated shipping date - April 2013.

Cool Mini Or Not (CMNGUG01) Zombicide is a collaborative game for 1 to 6 players, for 13 years old and up. A game lasts for 20 minutes (beginner board) to 3 hours (expert board). Each player controls from one (for 6 players) to four (solo game) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;survivors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, human beings in a zombie-infested town. In fact, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;survivors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; hastily change to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;hunters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; to smash zombies through and through. However, the team must constantly keep the balance between survival and slaughter: as the zombicide_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s going on, the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Danger level_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; is going up and infected are growing in numbers. Any misstep can turn to disaster. Zombicide is a fun and easy game with cool minis in an archetypical, popular and comics-inspired environment. Ambiance is constantly kept between _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;beat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;em up_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;survival horror_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; as characters keep on turning from preys to predators. Humor and gloom happily marry in a zombie-fest. Find weapons, kill zombies. The more zombies you kill, the more skilled you get, the more skilled you get, the more zombies appear. The only way out is Zombicide! Play 10 scenarios on different maps made from the included modular map tiles, or create your own.

Note: Assuming the buyer is willing I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll try to complete all paperwork required by the BGG Market Place on the day of purchase and have the item packed and shipped on the next working day. (see http://www.collectplus.co.uk/faqs) This service is good value and offers more flexibility on collection but make sure you understand what it is before opting for it! I will ship items to Europe, price to be agreed on request. On items under 2Kg postage can still be quite reasonable. It gets more expensive if a courier has to be used. Thanks for looking. Barry

Cool Mini Or Not (CMNGUG01) Zombicide is a collaborative game for 1 to 6 players, for 13 years old and up. A game lasts for 20 minutes (beginner board) to 3 hours (expert board). Each player controls from one (for 6 players) to four (solo game) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;survivors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, human beings in a zombie-infested town. In fact, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;survivors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; hastily change to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;hunters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; to smash zombies through and through. However, the team must constantly keep the balance between survival and slaughter: as the zombicide_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s going on, the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Danger level_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; is going up and infected are growing in numbers. Any misstep can turn to disaster. Zombicide is a fun and easy game with cool minis in an archetypical, popular and comics-inspired environment. Ambiance is constantly kept between _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;beat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;em up_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;survival horror_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; as characters keep on turning from preys to predators. Humor and gloom happily marry in a zombie-fest. Find weapons, kill zombies. The more zombies you kill, the more skilled you get, the more skilled you get, the more zombies appear. The only way out is Zombicide! Play 10 scenarios on different maps made from the included modular map tiles, or create your own.

COOL MINI OR NOT (CMNGUG01) Zombicide is a collaborative game for 1 to 6 players, for 13 years old and up. A game lasts for 20 minutes (beginner board) to 3 hours (expert board). Each player controls from one (for 6 players) to four (solo game) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;survivors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, human beings in a zombie-infested town. In fact, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;survivors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; hastily change to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;hunters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; to smash zombies through and through. However, the team must constantly keep the balance between survival and slaughter: as the zombicide_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s going on, the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Danger level_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; is going up and infected are growing in numbers. Any misstep can turn to disaster. Zombicide is a fun and easy game with cool minis in an archetypical, popular and comics-inspired environment. Ambiance is constantly kept between _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;beat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;em up_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;survival horror_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; as characters keep on turning from preys to predators. Humor and gloom happily marry in a zombie-fest. Find weapons, kill zombies. The more zombies you kill, the more skilled you get, the more skilled you get, the more zombies appear. The only way out is Zombicide! Play 10 scenarios on different maps made from the included modular map tiles, or create your own.

Cool Mini Or Not (CMNGUG01) Zombicide is a collaborative game for 1 to 6 players, for 13 years old and up. A game lasts for 20 minutes (beginner board) to 3 hours (expert board). Each player controls from one (for 6 players) to four (solo game) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;survivors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, human beings in a zombie-infested town. In fact, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;survivors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; hastily change to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;hunters_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; to smash zombies through and through. However, the team must constantly keep the balance between survival and slaughter: as the zombicide_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s going on, the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Danger level_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; is going up and infected are growing in numbers. Any misstep can turn to disaster. Zombicide is a fun and easy game with cool minis in an archetypical, popular and comics-inspired environment. Ambiance is constantly kept between _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;beat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;em up_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;survival horror_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; as characters keep on turning from preys to predators. Humor and gloom happily marry in a zombie-fest. Find weapons, kill zombies. The more zombies you kill, the more skilled you get, the more skilled you get, the more zombies appear. The only way out is Zombicide! Play 10 scenarios on different maps made from the included modular map tiles, or create your own.
